System architecture designed. Ready for integration and testing.

handoffs.summary: Claude Code handed off the core GodelAI repository and conflict data findings. Antigravity assumes responsibility for the broader Project Y unification, incorporating YSenseAI (Heart) and VerifiMind (Conscience).
